#labels Featured
[http://code.google.com/p/oolua/source/browse/#svn/trunk/unit_tests Unit tests] are provided and show OOLua usage, for anything which is not clear please ask for a sample in the [CheatSheet].<br />
Tests are preformed using [http://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/cppunit/index.php?title=Main_Page CppUnit] and [http://code.google.com/p/googlemock/ Gmock] an additional dependency of [http://premake.sourceforge.net/ Premake (3 series)] for building projects/workspaces/makefiles is required.
=Premake command line examples=

Building for Visual Studio 2008
{{{
premake --target vs2008
}}}
Building for Codeblocks on windows
{{{
premake --target cb-gcc --os windows
}}}
Building a makefile
{{{
premake --target gnu --os linux
}}}
